law.catch_line: A person who repairs or alters a boiler or pressure vessel shall:...
law.text:
A person who repairs or alters a boiler or pressure vessel shall:
give notice to and obtain approval from the Chief Boiler Inspector, a deputy boiler inspector, or a special inspector before beginning a repair or alteration that:
affects the working pressure or safety of a boiler or pressure vessel; or
involves fusion welding;
repair the boiler or pressure vessel in accordance with regulations adopted under this subtitle; and
provide reports, as required by regulations adopted under this subtitle, to the Chief Boiler Inspector and the owner of the boiler or pressure vessel.
